title: Big Shade, Small Package: Yakima MajorShady 270 Arrives
content:
Throwing shade? That's Yakima's department this month, as the company rolls out the MajorShady 270, with 80 square feet of coverage.

The post Big Shade, Small Package: Yakima MajorShady 270 Arrives appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
